short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that gives you quick and easy access to Google's closure compiler service

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that gives you quick and easy access to Google's closure compiler service to compress/minify your javascript. Gives you the basic compression stats and lets you add external URLs as well.
